description: Try our easy to follow Chilli Pork Ribs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork ribs,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Chilli Pork Ribs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, finely grated rind and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the oil, chilli powder, barbecue seasoning, lime rind and juice, garlic and tomato ketchup in a small bowl.
Put the ribs in a shallow glass or ceramic dish and brush with the marinade. Cover loosely and leave to marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Arrange the ribs on the upper rack of the halogen oven. Set the temperature to 200°C and cook the ribs for about 20 minutes, turning them once, until golden. Serve with jacket potatoes and a salad.
